A very elderly Joseph leads a plump-faced Mary and the startled-looking child on a high-stepping donkey through a rocky landscape with trees. Miniature from a humble Flemish book of hours known to have been in Suffolk from the early fifteenth century. (See Image 266)
press & hold mouse button to zoom little by little
shift & hold mouse button to zoom out little by little
press 'a' to fit image to applet
press 'f' to get full size 1 to 1 image
press 'w' to fit to applet width
press 'h' to fit to applet height
